36 namespace vistle {
37 
38 template<class Archive>
39 void Object::serialize(Archive &ar)
40 {
41  d()->serialize<Archive>(ar);
42 }
43 
44 template<class Archive>
45 void Object::Data::save(Archive &ar) const {
46  ar & V_NAME(ar, "meta", meta);
47  StdAttributeMap attrMap;
48  auto attrs = getAttributeList();
49  for (auto a: attrs) {
50  attrMap[a] = getAttributes(a);
51  }
52  ar & V_NAME(ar, "attributes", attrMap);
53 }
54 
55 template<class Archive>
56 void Object::Data::load(Archive &ar) {
57  ar & V_NAME(ar, "meta", meta);
58  attributes.clear();
59  StdAttributeMap attrMap;
60  ar & V_NAME(ar, "attributes", attrMap);
61  for (auto &kv: attrMap) {
62  auto &a = kv.first;
63  auto &vallist = kv.second;
64  setAttributeList(a, vallist);
65  }
66 }
67 
68 template<class Archive>
69 void Object::saveObject(Archive &ar) const {
70 
71  ar & V_NAME(ar, "object_name", this->getName());
72  ar & V_NAME(ar, "object_type", (int)this->getType());
73  this->saveToArchive(ar);
74 }
75 
76 template<class Archive>
77 Object *Object::loadObject(Archive &ar) {
78 
79  Object *obj = nullptr;
80  try {
81  std::string name;
82  ar & V_NAME(ar, "object_name", name);
83  int type;
84  ar & V_NAME(ar, "object_type", type);
85  Shm::the().lockObjects();
86  auto objData = Shm::the().getObjectDataFromName(name);
87  if (objData && objData->isComplete()) {
88  objData->ref();
89  Shm::the().unlockObjects();
90  obj = Object::create(objData);
91  if (!ar.currentObject())
92  ar.setCurrentObject(objData);
93  objData->unref();
94  assert(obj->refcount() >= 1);
95  } else {
96  if (objData) {
97  std::cerr << "Object::loadObject: have " << name << ", but incomplete, refcount=" << objData->refcount << std::endl;
98  }
99  Shm::the().unlockObjects();
100  auto funcs = ObjectTypeRegistry::getType(type);
101  obj = funcs.createEmpty(name);
102  obj->loadFromArchive(ar);
103  assert(obj->refcount() >= 1);
104  }
105 #ifdef USE_BOOST_ARCHIVE
106  } catch (const boost::archive::archive_exception &ex) {
107  std::cerr << "Boost.Archive exception: " << ex.what() << std::endl;
108  if (ex.code == boost::archive::archive_exception::unsupported_version) {
109  std::cerr << "***" << std::endl;
110  std::cerr << "*** received Boost archive in unsupported format, supported is up to " << boost::archive::BOOST_ARCHIVE_VERSION() << std::endl;
111  std::cerr << "***" << std::endl;
112  }
113  return obj;
114 #endif
115  } catch (...) {
116  throw;
117  }
118  assert(ar.currentObject() == obj->d());
119  if (obj->d()->unresolvedReferences == 0) {
120  obj->refresh();
121  obj->check();
122  if (ar.objectCompletionHandler())
123  ar.objectCompletionHandler()();
124  } else {
125  //std::cerr << "LOADED " << obj->d()->name << " (" << obj->d()->type << "): " << obj->d()->unresolvedReferences << " unresolved references" << std::endl;
126  }
127  return obj;
128 }
129 
130 } // namespace vistle

132 #endif
